DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate influence systematic extra intravenous fluid supplementation phototherapy comparison fluid supplementation due short term demand preterm infant .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Intravenous Fluid Supplementation Serum Bilirubin Cardiorespiratory Parameters Preterm Infants During Phototherapy
DOC.detailed_description: 60 preterm infant ( GA â‰¤ 32 week ) assign randomly either receive fluid supplementation due short term demand ( control group , n=30 ; ) 20 % extra fluid supplementation ( study group , n=30 ) intermediate phototherapy . Collected data : - cardiorespiratory parameter ( heart rate , blood pressure , SaO2 capillary refill time , breathe rate , temperature ) pain score complete first day phototherapy - The maximum total serum bilirubin level ( TSB ) within one week onset phototherapy
